titles.title: A bill for the relief of San Juan County Nursing Home, of Blanding, Utah.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

calendar.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator Kennedy without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 639.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 10/28/1987--Introduced. Relieves a named county in the State of Utah, the successor in interest to a specified nursing home of all liability under title VI of the Public Health Service Act resulting from the sale of the nursing home, provided certain conditions are met.
